CHAT.comment: CHAT format needs to be double-checked
screen time is elapsed time from beginning of visit in min:sec

u.a: screen time
C cuts on plate with a knife
no response from C
M puts together cup and saucer; sets by C
C puts knife in cup and stirs
M holds teapot out for C to take; C looks in it
C takes pot; stirs with knife
M jostles C's arm so he can't stir; holds pot with C
M lets go of pot; C looks inside
M begins sorting dishes
<bef> C stirs pot with knife
no response from C; keeps stirring
<bef> C stops stirring; sets teapot on table
C cuts with knife on plate
M sets pot by C; lifts lid and sets it down again
C lifts pot and stares at it intently
<bef> C sets pot down; manipulates lid
no response from C
<bef> C cuts on plate
no response from C
<bef> C reaches with knife toward something by M
M drinks from her cup
C stares at M's cup
M points at C's cup
M touches C's cup
C looks in his cup; gets up and looks in M's cup
C drinks out of M's cup
C puts his spoon in M's cup
M stirs in her cup; puts spoon down when finished
M picks up C's cup and hands to him
C has problem grasping cup from M
C holds M's finger instead of cup
M drinks from cup
C drinks from his cup
M laughs with C
C drinks a few more times; makes noise
C begins stomping feet on floor
Examiner enters; changes toys
screen time; 03:03 elapsed and transcribed
screen time
M takes book from C; sets it on table so she can see better
C falls out of chair; M sets it up and holds for C
C struggles to get up
C finally sits down; M holds him up; pushes chair in
M points
C reaches for another book
C struggles to pick up book; C stares at cover picture
C opens book
C squirms and looks around room
C is moving his chair around
C still focused on chair
M taps C's shoulder
M points
M points at book C picked up while singing
C sets book down
